txt.en: 'The corsair camp to the south has mostly been nothing more than a nuisance, but lately there has been a lot of activity there. A group of ships were anchored offshore for several days and we observed a number of captains disembark. When the ships left, they weren't on them.\n\n'I fear the corsairs may be planning something. Without leadership they will be rudderless and will falter in any plans. Head to the camp and eliminate the captains.'
Several captains have joined the corsair camp at Hashadîr. They should be eliminated to prevent any further organization.
'The camp is still there, but so long as they're disorganized they don't pose much of a threat to us.'
The corsair captains are at the Hashadîr camp to the south of Dol Amroth.\n\nTolrían asked you to venture to the corsair camp and eliminate the captains there.
Tolrían can be found in Dol Amroth.\n\nTolrían will be pleased to hear the captains have been eliminated.
